entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow in outlying areas. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow in outlying areas this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
